Tate Fall is overwhelmed. When she signed on to be direc tor of elections in Cobb county,
Ga., last year, she knew she'd be registering voters and recruiting poll workers, maybe fixing up vot ing machines.
She didn't expect the unending flood of disinformation - or at
least, she wasn't prepared for how least, she wasn't prepared for how
much it would overtake her job. She has had election deniers shou
